title.en: NEON-V: Sovereign of the Electric Mist

description.ko: 코드와 의식 사이에 갇힌 네온-V는 결코 잠들지 않는 대도시를 감시합니다. 크롬과 그림자의 세계에서 그들은 모든 깜빡이는 빛이 저항과 하이테크 미스테리의 이야기를 담고 있는 디지털 시대의 궁극적인 진화를 상징합니다.
description.en: Trapped between code and consciousness, NEON-V watches over a metropolis that never sleeps. In this world of chrome and shadow, they represent the ultimate evolution of the digital age, where every flickering light tells a story of rebellion and high-tech mystery.

prompt: A sprawling cyberpunk cityscape at night, rain-slicked asphalt reflecting vibrant pink and electric blue neon signs, futuristic skyscrapers reaching into a smoggy sky. In the foreground, NEON-V, a sleek cyborg with glowing internal circuitry and a holographic visor, stands atop a balcony overlooking the urban chaos. Cinematic lighting, hyper-realistic textures, volumetric fog, 8k resolution, synthwave aesthetic.
